en:

(Tōutōumōmō)

surreptitiously

Definitions of 偷偷摸摸
[ 简体中文 -> English ]

adverb
    surreptitiously
        偷偷摸摸, 暗中, 隐蔽, 窃
    furtively
        偷偷摸摸, 窃
    covertly
        隐蔽, 偷偷摸摸, 偷偷
